trans-unit.source: Provides an iterator over a selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 提供一組選取節點的迭代器

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class is not positioned on the first node in a selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>所傳回物件<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>類別並非位於所選的節點集的第一個節點。

trans-unit.source: A call to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class must be made to position the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object on the first node in the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>類別必須進行定位<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>中選取的節點集的第一個節點上的物件。

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>, if you edit the current node or any of its ancestors, your current position is lost.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>，如果您編輯目前的節點或任何其祖系，您目前的位置將會遺失。

trans-unit.source: If you want to edit a number of nodes that you have selected, create a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> array, copy all of the nodes from the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> into the array, then iterate through the array and modify the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要編輯的節點數目，您已選取，建立<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>陣列，請將所有的節點複製<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>成陣列，然後逐一查看陣列，並修改節點。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to iterate over an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> collection by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: 有兩種方式來反覆查看<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>集合使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>類別。

trans-unit.source: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 一種方式是使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>取得目前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>執行個體，如下列範例所示：

trans-unit.source: Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 另一種方式是使用`foreach`迴圈來呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>方法並使用傳回的<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>介面，以列舉的節點，如下列範例所示：

trans-unit.source: You should either use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您應該使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>或使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 同時使用這兩種方法會造成非預期的結果。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method is called first, and then the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>首先，呼叫方法，然後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>中呼叫方法`foreach`迴圈，`foreach`迴圈將不會啟動列舉結果集合的開頭，但從位置之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class to select a node set using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>類別，以選取節點集使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>類別。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例採用 `books.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> class, you must override the following members:
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" />類別，您必須覆寫下列成員：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別建構函式來初始化此類型中的狀態會呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a clone of this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> 物件的複製。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> object clone of this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> 物件的新 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> 物件複製。

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object is positioned at the same node in the node set if calls have been made to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 複製<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>物件位於相同的節點中的節點設定如果已對呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object is not affected by subsequent changes to this <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: 複製<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>物件不會受到後續變更<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the last node in the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 取得選取節點集中最後一個節點的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the last node in the selected set of nodes, or 0 if there are no selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: 所選取節點集中最後一個節點的索引，如果沒有選取的節點，則為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A> property does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A>屬性不會影響的位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object for this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" />, positioned on the current context node.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 物件，該物件位於目前的內容節點上。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object positioned on the context node from which the node set was selected.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 物件，位於所選取節點集的內容節點上。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext" /> method must be called to move the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> to the first node in the selected set.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext" /> 方法，將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator" /> 移至所選取節點集的第一個節點上。

trans-unit.source: You can use the properties of the returned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object to obtain information on the current node.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用傳回的屬性<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>物件，取得目前節點的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: However, the returned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object should not be modified.
trans-unit.target: 不過，傳回<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不能修改物件。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object cannot be moved away from the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>物件無法移開選定的節點集。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can clone the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以複製<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>物件使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>類別。

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object can then be moved away from the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: 複製<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>物件可以再移開選定的節點集。

trans-unit.source: This method of cloning the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object might affect the performance of the XPath query.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法複製<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>物件可能會影響效能的 XPath 查詢。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectAncestors%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectDescendants%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectChildren%2A> methods result in no nodes being selected, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> property might not be pointing to the context node.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectAncestors%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectDescendants%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectChildren%2A>方法會產生任何所選取的節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>屬性可能不會指向的內容節點。

trans-unit.source: To test whether nodes have been selected, use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A> property as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 若要測試是否已選取的節點，請使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A>屬性，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets all book titles authored by Herman Melville using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會取得撰寫 Herman Melville 使用的所有書名<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>屬性<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>物件和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>類別。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the index of the current position in the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得選取節點集中目前位置的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the current position.
trans-unit.target: 目前位置的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index is 1-based.
trans-unit.target: 以 1 起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the first node has an index of 1.
trans-unit.target: 因此，第一個節點有索引為 1。

trans-unit.source: An index of 0 indicates there are no selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: 索引為 0 表示沒有選取的節點。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠會傳回的正整數。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object to iterate through the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 物件，逐一查看選取的節點集。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object to iterate through the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 物件，逐一查看選取的節點集。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is positioned on the current position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式位在目前的位置上<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>物件。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to iterate over an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> collection by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: 有兩種方式來反覆查看<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>集合使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>類別。

trans-unit.source: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 一種方式是使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>取得目前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>執行個體，如下列範例所示：

trans-unit.source: Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 另一種方式是使用`foreach`迴圈來呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>方法並使用傳回的<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>介面，以列舉的節點，如下列範例所示：

trans-unit.source: You should either use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您應該使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>或使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 同時使用這兩種方法會造成非預期的結果。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method is called first, and then the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>首先，呼叫方法，然後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>中呼叫方法`foreach`迴圈，`foreach`迴圈將不會啟動列舉結果集合的開頭，但從位置之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object returned by the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current" /> property to the next node in the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會將 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 屬性傳回的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current" /> 物件移至所選取節點集的下一個節點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> object moved to the next node; <see langword="false" /> if there are no more selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator" /> 物件移至下一個節點則為 <see langword="true" />，如果沒有其他選取的節點，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object is positioned on the first node in the selected node set only after the initial call to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>物件所在的初始呼叫後才設定所選節點中的第一個節點<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The node set is created in document order.
trans-unit.target: 節點集是以文件順序建立。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, calling the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method moves to the next node in document order.
trans-unit.target: 因此，呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法會移至文件順序中的下一個節點。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to iterate over an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> collection by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: 有兩種方式來反覆查看<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>集合使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>類別。

trans-unit.source: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 一種方式是使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>取得目前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>執行個體，如下列範例所示：

trans-unit.source: Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 另一種方式是使用`foreach`迴圈來呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>方法並使用傳回的<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>介面，以列舉的節點，如下列範例所示：

trans-unit.source: You should either use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您應該使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>或使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 同時使用這兩種方法會造成非預期的結果。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method is called first, and then the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>首先，呼叫方法，然後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>中呼叫方法`foreach`迴圈，`foreach`迴圈將不會啟動列舉結果集合的開頭，但從位置之後<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class to select a node set using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>類別，以選取節點集使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>類別。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `books.xml` file as input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例採用 `books.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立目前執行個體複本的新物件。

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體複本的新物件。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ICloneable> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
